item.description: This article provides a brief overview of the core concepts, technical approaches, and governance considerations for developing a Bioregional Knowledge Commons (BKC), distilled ...

item.title: Bioregional Knowledge Commoning - Part 1: Foundations and Participatory Ontology Design
item.description: This is Part 1 of a 3-part series on Bioregional Knowledge Commoning. Part 2 covers technical architecture for implementing BKC systems. Part 3 explores governance and sustainability models.

item.title: Bioregional Knowledge Commoning - Part 2: Technical Architecture for Sovereignty and Engagement
item.description: This is Part 2 of a 3-part series on Bioregional Knowledge Commoning. Part 1 covered Foundations and Participatory Ontology Design. Part 3 will explore Governance, Sustainability, and Implementation.

item.title: Bioregional Knowledge Commoning - Part 3: Governance, Sustainability, and Implementation
item.description: This is Part 3 of a 3-part series on Bioregional Knowledge Commoning. Part 1 covered Foundations and Participatory Ontology Design. Part 2 explored Technical Architecture for Sovereignty and Engagement.
